text: E'ina hu'negu, hagagema hu'nea trazama tevemo tefanane hiaza huno ana maka te fanana hanige'za, zafamofo rafu'namo hagage higeno ani'namo harari huneramigeno, flaua'ma renteana zaho'mo eripopo hutreaza hugahaze. Na'ankure Israeli vahete'ma ruotage'ma huno hankavenentake'ma hu'nea Ra Anumzamofo kasegea amagera onte'nazagu anara hugahaze.
